titleStmt.title: The affections of a pious soule, unto our Saviour-Christ Expressed in a mixt treatise of verse and prose. By Richard Flecknoe.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Raworth for William Brooke, dwelling at the upper end of Holborne in Turpius Rents,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The affections of a pious soule, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
